metadata.title: CVE-2022-29250 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package, that provides ITILService Desk features, licenses tracking and software auditing. In versionsprior to version 10.0.1 it is possible to add extra information by SQLinjection on search pages. In order to exploit this vulnerability a usermust be logged in.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
